## 3D Surface Plot

### Load Packages

```{r}
library(plotly)
```

## Plotting Map

```{r}
plot_ly(z = volcano, type = "surface")
```

## Boxplot

```{r}
p <- plot_ly(midwest, x = ~ percollege, color = ~ state, type = "box")
p
```
